title: Notification system
notes: No ability to send notifactions for tasks that need to be completed soon

title: Priority levels
need: Reduce cognitive load and make task managment easier for individuals with a SR
notes: If tasks can not be ordered by priority important tasks can be buried under new tasks and forgotten about

title: Complexity levels
notes: Lets users focus on simpler tasks when they are more fatigued

title: Keyboard navigation
need: Make navigating the page easier for keyboard users
notes: If keyboard navigation was not considered during development users can struggle to use application with only keyboard

title: Dark mode
need: Provide more contrast for users in bright enviroments or low vision users
candidate_fix: If dark mode not implemented then users with low vision or in bright enviroments might struggle to see the app

title: Task editing
need: Reduces cognitive load and makes easier to fix mistakes for users with motor issues
column12: If not able to edit taks to amend issues users have to delete and recreate the task with edits which is frustrating especially for users with motor issues who may struggle to do this quickly
